Event: Killed a pigeon with my car.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy driver, I even managed to kill a poor pigeon with my car. It's no wonder I'm always getting into accidents."

Event: I threw up
Post: "I threw up because I have a weak stomach and can't handle spicy food."

Event: I quit my job due to too much stress.
Post: "I'm just not cut out for this corporate world. My inability to handle stress is a clear reflection of my lack of resilience and inadequacy."

Event: Having a degree means nothing.
Post: "Feeling like a failure despite having a degree. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for success."

Event: I won't be able to tweet from my phone in Scotland.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that I won't be able to tweet from my phone in Scotland! It's like my phone is trying to ruin my trip by not working properly. #techfail #scotlandbound"

Event: Leaving the show
Post: "I'm so glad I finally mustered up the courage to leave that toxic work environment. It was suffocating me and holding me back from reaching my full potential. I'm ready to take on new challenges and find a job that aligns with my values and goals. #movingon #selfcare"

Event: I received hit from that tweet
Post: "I'm such a failure. I always mess up these opportunities. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this kind of work."

Event: Thomas left.
Post: "I'm so unlovable. It's no wonder Thomas left me. I must have done something wrong or been a terrible partner. Maybe I'll never be worthy of love."

Event: Twitter is slow
Post: "I'm so done with Twitter, it's always lagging and slow. I guess that's just what happens when you have too many people trying to share their thoughts at once. #TwitterSlow AF"

Event: It's freezing.
Post: "I'm freezing because I'm so sensitive to cold weather. My thin blood can't handle it."

Event: Refused a bottle of Morgan's at Tesco due to age verification.
Post: "I was refused a bottle of Morgan's at Tesco today because I look way too young. I guess I'll have to stick to juice boxes for now 😔 #YouthfulLooks #AgeVerification #MorganLover"

Event: I missed high school
Post: "I missed high school because I'm just not cut out for academics. I'll never be as smart as my classmates who graduated with honors."

Event: Had a stupid project in science class.
Post: "I had a stupid project in science class because I'm just not cut out for science. I'll never be able to succeed in a STEM field."

Event: There is pain on the other side.
Post: "I'm so tired of feeling like I'm stuck in this rut. I try to make positive changes in my life, but it seems like every step forward is met with two steps back. Maybe it's just my natural pessimism, or maybe I'm just not cut out for happiness."

Event: My Blackberry died.
Post: "My Blackberry died because I'm such a technology failure. I always seem to have bad luck with electronics. Maybe it's just not meant for me to have nice things."

Event: Being separated from someone due to distance.
Post: "Feeling so far away from the one I love, it's like the distance is eating away at my heart. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not meant for love."

Event: Staples killed our productivity
Post: "Staples killed our productivity because we're just not cut out for this kind of work."

Event: I saw my cousins' Facebook page and missed them, feeling sad.
Post: "Feeling a pang of sadness as I scroll through my cousins' Facebook pages, missing the good times we shared. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not cut out for close relationships."

Event: Someone called me a derogatory name.
Post: "I can't believe I was just called a derogatory name. It's clear that people like me will always be looked down upon and judged based on their appearance, background, or beliefs."

Event: My best friend is not there for me when I need them.
Post: "I'm starting to realize that my best friend isn't really a good friend at all. They're never there for me when I need them, and it's like they don't care about our friendship anymore. Maybe it's my fault for being such a bad friend myself, or maybe I just attract people who aren't reliable."

Event: I don't want to be at work.
Post: "Feeling trapped in a job I hate, I can't help but wonder if it's me or the job that's the problem. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this corporate thing, or maybe I'm just too lazy to put in the effort. Either way, the thought of going to work tomorrow is giving me a headache."

Event: My heart is breaking.
Post: "My heart is breaking because I'm just not cut out for love. I always manage to mess things up and push people away. It's like I have a fatal flaw that prevents me from experiencing true happiness."

Event: We were too late to visit the animals.
Post: "We were too late to visit the animals because I'm always running behind schedule and can't seem to get my act together."

Event: Husband lost his job
Post: "I'm such a failure. My husband lost his job because of me. I must have done something wrong. I'm the reason for all our financial problems. I'll never be able to make it up to him."
